flawed_nl_solution:
She has 810 minutes to do work because 3 times 60 equals <<3*60=810>>810
She has already spent 150 minutes on homework because 45 plus 30 plus 50 plus 25 equals <<45+30+50+25=150>>150
She has 660 minutes to finish her project because 810 minus 150 equals <<810-150=660>>660.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
